title: Keep Your Pets Warm Indoors
description: During cold months, keep your pets inside where it's warm and cozy. Provide them with soft blankets and a comfortable resting area away from cold drafts.

title: Protect Paws from Snow and Ice
description: Use pet-safe balms or booties to protect your pet’s paws from salt, ice, and cold surfaces during walks. Always wipe their paws clean when returning home.

title: Ensure Proper Nutrition
description: Winter can increase energy needs for outdoor pets. Consult your vet to adjust their diet and ensure they’re getting the right balance of nutrients.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Shorten your pet’s outdoor playtime during extremely cold weather. Always supervise them and bring them back indoors before they get too cold.
